title: go/doc/go_spec.html: 9 is not a prime, because winter is coming
body:
by **kosak@kosak.com**: 
primes := []int{2, 3, 5, 7, 9, 2147483647}

I gather from the storied history of this line [note 1] that this is some kind of inside
joke, but I feel torn because you also say "We pride ourselves on being meticulous;
no issue is too small." [note 2] At the risk of failing your humor test, I hereby
file this defect report :-)

[note 1]
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?name=3bbc978a64a4
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?name=61a004522a55
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=389444436d35
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c90b59861968

[note 2]
http://golang.org/project/
